name: Blake D
text: Yesterday at 2pm myself and the rest of the staff at this location were given notice the store would be shutting down and we were all terminated effective today. Interesting how companies like 2 weeks notice but give their staff half a day …More

name: Patrick Drennan
text: I have ordered from this location 4-5 times. Every single time something is wrong. Today, it was dropped pizza. When I complained, the manager told me I should apply for a job. I have literally never had a chance to enjoy a fresh pizza from this location.

name: nickolas nord
text: great place to get a surprise pizza!!! different toppings, no cheese sometimes....THEY HAVE ALWAYS GIVEN ME THE CORRECT CRUST STYLE ♥ that's the 1 star earned. Keep up the great work? *sad that Pizza Hut is better. more pleasant staff & orders have been accurate so go the extra block north my boulder buddies

name: Joseph Vaughn
text: Everyone loves to hate on poor papa john but this place feeds me at least twice a week. Its good pizza at a fair price. 1 employee mentioned that she was paid well. So that's a reason to support the boulder version of this pizza chain. Better ingredients better pizza so says Shaq.

name: Drew Ayling
text: I'm not ordering here again. Always always always late. Always always always delivered cold pizza. Weekday afternoon, weekend evening. Don't care. Sun or snow. Always late.

name: Trevor Kautzman
text: I ordered online and I was told 25-35 minutes. I waited an hour before I called to see where my order was. A male staff member told me it was out for delivery and it would still be another 15-20 minutes. I waited 25 minutes and called back. …More

name: EVANTHETOON
text: Fast and friendly service. Yummy pizzas. Get cheesesticks with honey mustard on the side.

name: Carlos Aragon
text: I absolutely love papa johns pizza! Some of, if not the greatest pizza I’ve ever had! Absolutely amazing stuff, the pizza is incredibly good and the wings are just as good! I love this place so much. Definitely my go to place for an amazing meal!

name: Liz Nord
text: Below is my original post. I had a horrible experiance here with a certain employee. Upon going to the physical location and explaining to a different employee my issues and concerns. They were very polite and fixed the pizza right away. I …More

name: Peter Metzler
text: Pizza was delivered on time but the driver didnt even try to find my apartment. I get that's super critical for me to detail but its delivery, not almost delivery or else I would have gotten digiorno.

name: Matt Sidor
text: Went to pick up my order and they were blasting rap music with a curse word in every verse at full volume. The cashier and I literally had to shout to each other across the counter to hear each other. …More

name: Katlyn Stockslager
text: I've ordered from this place multiple times. They get my order wrong more times than not. If your order is wrong, don't expect them to fix it. Instead expect to be berated by the rude staff that will tell you they know how your pizza looks …More

name: Emily
text: As a frequent customer I originally gave a rating of five stars because I'd never had any problems. However, after this last time I've decided to change it. First I made an online order at 6:30 pm. The estimated arrival time was in 30-45 …More

name: Marisa Newbery
text: I have no problem with emotional support dogs, but the windows were all the way down and the dog did not seem sweet at all and I was afraid it was going to come after me and my dog. Maybe have your employee not leave it un attended with the …More

name: Adam Krosnowski
text: Horrible customer service. Would rather go anywhere else. The woman on the phone told me to call another shop?? Good job guys!!

name: Weston Hood
text: Omg worst pizza. Taste like dog food if have the guts to reheat it

name: Bryan Lawlor
text: Mary is always a great help and gets my order perfect everytime.  Thank you so much!!!

name: Sam Michelson
text: Employees were on their phones. I heard the store phone ring like 2-3 times and the cashier didn't pick it up. Even the pizza guy was on his phone.

name: John Miller
text: I ate here for the first time, and it was very good.  The cheese pizza had good flavor & texture.

name: Todd Kennedy
text: The pizza is to die for! I think everyone at this location is great, but an employee named Adam Curtis is the reason I keep coming back. He is extremely professional and always makes sure I am completely satisfied.

name: Alex Kowal
text: Horrible! Don't waste you money or time! Pizza was delivered with hairs on it! On top of that was cussed out by an obviously drunk employee on the phone and again after physically returning the pizzas to the store. Don't expect any help …More

name: James Hoover
text: This pizza tastes like cardboard digorno

name: jenny rolapp
text: Good pizza! Super fast online ordering and pick up! Make sure you enter promo code before checkout on online ordering ;)

name: Joshua Dore
text: Pizza is good, but this location NEVER has delivery available due to not having enough drivers.

name: Lainey Bartley
text: My order was supposed to arrive at 6pm and did not receive our order until close to 8:45pm Tried calling the store at least 6 times to cancel our order at the 2 hour late mark and the phone was never answered.

name: Joseph Colombe
text: Not the best example of their product. Several places within blocks that serve better cheap pizza.

name: Gabrielle Kreft
text: I have always LOVED Papa John's as they have never let me down with taste or service and last night was no exception! After a long day and a much needed pizza, my roommate and I ordered online a custom pizza and original breadsticks. When …More

name: Charlie Day
text: 5 stars for employees 0 STARS for Papa Johns. LET US KNOW THAT THE COMPANY IS POCKETING THE "DELIVERY FEE". I shorted my drivers tip because the website never said he wouldn't see that money.

name: Genevieve Roberts
text: Standard papa johns. Friendly staff and efficient pizza making!

name: Israel Juras
text: Delivery was late so cold pizza. Delivery driver smelled like weed. Very disappointing

name: Andrew Preger
text: If you like to wait for a pizza delivery for over 1.5 hrs, give these guys a call and place an order. You will not be disappointed.

name: Loren Williams
text: excuses, excuses. the service here sucks...I already paid you so where's my god damn pizza. two times in a row. they need check their attitudes at the door and get back to the basics of running a business, like cooking decent food, and employing folks who understand the value of customer loyalty and service.

name: Him K
text: I put in a simple order. Ham on the whole pizza. Sausage on the right half, Pepperoni on the left.  The pizza had pepperoni on the whole pizza. And both sausage and ham on the left half.   I didn't think the order was THAT hard.

name: Colin Stearns
text: Had a minor issue with the order, and they went above and beyond to make sure they made good. I don't expect much from delivery pizza, but it's nice to have them make a serious effort to correct mistakes.

name: Daniel Won
text: I had a pretty bad experience at this location as they refused to make good on one of their coupon promotions which they sent me.. I found that you could work around it by ordering and paying online.. but when asked in person and over the phone they try to deny that they run the deal..shady.

name: stacy bush
text: Papa John's has always come through for me.  Best Pizza in Boulder so my son thinks. Late sometimes but it happens.

name: Parker Scott
text: The dude working had more teeth than brain cells. He had about 5 teeth. I watched my pizza come through the oven and out onto the ground. Then he tries to tell me it didn't happen.

name: Daniel West
text: I love papa John's pizza just don't get the chicken nugget things. My kids wouldn't even eat em.

name: Jeong Arvin
text: We ordered food for delivery from like a block away, it took more than 40 minutes, even longer than the estimated time (19 to 29 minutes). If i could i wanted to cancel the order already

name: Amanda Villeme
text: Was stoked to use this coupon that a PJ crew member had dropped off at my place of business the other day. But when I called I was placed on hold for as long as it takes to make and deliver the dang thing.... so I called Cosmos.. :/ Sorry

name: Ilona Crutzen
text: We usually order from Pizza hut,, but thought we would give Papas a try again. We were very disappointed!!A very soggy mess is what we got, not a pleasant meal.Back to Pizza Hut we go!

name: Azzam
text: Just Okay

name: Natalie Buchanan
text: The pizza here is good.

name: ray pierce
text: It's alright,  standard Papa John's.

name: Adam Fortin
text: Typical Papa John's.

name: Jason Nielsen
text: Online order was ready when I arrived.

name: Evan Rowe
text: Food poisoning!  Unreal.  BEWARE!!

name: Maggie Dolores
text: food was good

name: Samik Dasgupta
text: Ok

name: Yazeed
text: Driver never came

name: Mia A.
text: Just got food poisoning (and I've been throwing up for three hours)from their breadsticks thanks papa john's!

name: Ralph Coles
text: Terrible delivery time been waiting at least 2 hours for it and it was my favorite place to order pizza but not anymore

name: Daniel Dahlman
text: The chicken nugget things were horrible. That and the pizza made me so sick. Get ready for indigestion!

name: Anthony Gunther
text: Good pizza fast!

name: Chris Jost
text: The crust is where it's at

name: Catherine Bouchard
text: Papa John SUCKS!!!!!!

name: Levi Rajnowski
text: ordered and were told it was going to take 30-45 minutes to deliver and it's been an hour and fifteen minutes.

name: Walter kappler
text: Do not order from here if you expect an order of one pizza to be delivered in less than an hour and a half.

name: William Hayes
text: I ordered the pizza and pre tipped the order on my card. The order was an hour late when it got here and they never even offered to take care of me. Then they told me my credit card would be refunded a week later, maybe...

name: Adam G
text:
(Translated by Google) Gnar

(Original)
Gnar
